text: Adventures of Captain Marvel is a 12-chapter movie serial released in 1941 by RKO Radio Pictures. It was produced by Republic Studios. It stars Tom Tyler as Captain Marvel and Frank Coughlan, Jr. as Billy Batson. It was directed by William Witney and John English. ==References== * Weiss, Ken and Ed Goodgold. 1972. To Be Continued... New York: Crown Publishers, Inc. pp. 180â€“182. title: Adventures of Captain Marvel
